One App. Every Payment. Zero Stress

Simplify Every Payment with One Powerful App

Billia lets you pay bills, top up Billia, buy data and manage your wallet — all in one place. Fast. Secure. Reliable.

100,000+ beginners making payments smarter every day

Everything You Need to Pay Smarter

All-in-One Bill Payments

Pay for electricity, TV, internet, education, and betting — all in seconds!

Airtime & Data Top-Up

Buy airtime and mobile data for yourself or others — Instant and reliable.

Virtual Dollar Card

Shop globally with your own secure virtual dollar card — perfect for subscriptions and online payments.

Introducing Billia AI: Smarter, Faster, Personal

From paying phone bills to buying airtime or electricity, Billia AI makes every payment simpler, faster, and stress-free — just by asking.
